001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product_type;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007import javax.annotation.Nullable;
008
009import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
010
011public interface AttributeDefinitionContainer {
012    List<AttributeDefinition> getAttributes();
013
014    @Nullable
015    default AttributeDefinition getAttribute(final String attributeName) {
016        return findAttribute(attributeName).orElse(null);
017    }
018
019    default Optional<AttributeDefinition> findAttribute(final String attributeName) {
020        return getAttributes().stream()
021                .filter(attribute -> StringUtils.equals(attributeName, attribute.getName()))
022                .findAny();
023    }
024}
